item.description:
Ok this is a change of pace, I heard about a burlesque version of the nutcracker called the slutcracker. It sounds like a lot of fun so I am setting it up as a meetup. I know, it's not a movie. I can't believe I am actually saying this, but we are not entertained by movies alone!

The tickets are $26, including fees, which is not bad for a live performance, but the show is for a very limited engagement and with the holiday theme and all, will probably sell out fast. To buy tickets go to:

https://www.vendini.c...

Please keep you rsvp's up to date and include a message that you bought your ticket. Also, please be on time if you want to sit with the group.

I will be in the lobby by 7:15, with my meetup sign and pin. It is general admission seating, so we need to go in for seats by 7:30 at the latest, so we can all sit together. Actual showtime is 8PM.

Parking in Davis Square can be tricky. Sommerville just changed the rules so that meters and business parking are free after 8PM, instead of the 6 PM it use to be. I recommend taking the T. The red line goes to Davis Square and there are several buses that go there as well. Routes: 87, 88, 89, 94, 96.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a meetup pin and a meetup sign and will be waiting inside in the lobby.
item.name: Slutcracker
